This project is to develop a software that provides solutions for library management process and library usage:
- Maintain the details of books and library members.
- Allow members to query availability of books and maximum limit for borrowing and to borrow books.
- Allow librarian to make statistical reports
- Manage books, book borrowing, insertion and monitoring
